segments.text: The sink overflows with water, creating a small lake at the woman's feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unfazed, as if it's just part of the kitchen routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find that quite shocking, especially with the children nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Do they not realize how slippery the floor has become?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is balancing precariously; I can see the hesitation on his face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost comical, watching these dynamics unfold in such an ordinary setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then my heart races at the thought of an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
